zone.line: galleries of the Coliseum, crost their path — His
was limb form which tho emaciated displayed
-played the elementary outlines of exquisite
grace was enveloped in an antient chlamys
his snow white feet were fitted
Which half concealed his face. It was a
with ivory sandals delicately sculptured in the
face once seen, never to be forgotten. The
likeness of two winged figures meeting
lips, & the fro moulding of the chin
resembled the eager & impassioned tenderness
the statues of
& grassy lanes which led to the of Antinous, but
instead of the effeminate sullenness of their
eye & the narrow smoothness of the forehead
shone an expression of profound & piercing
thought, the brow was clear & open, like
the refle and his eyes deep, like two wells
of chrystalline water which reflect the
all beholding Heavens. Over all was spread
a timid expression of womanish tenderness
& hesitation, which contrasted & yet
